availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, resident. Tennessee native. Son of Alexander Hall. Married to Sarah E. Hall. Father of James W. Hall and Ellen F. Hall. Resident of Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Tharps, p. 128. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District 1, p. 28. Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, North Hampshire, p. 27.
